short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Customize and persist your TypeRacer images with an easy-to-use interface.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🏎️ TypeRacer Car Customizer

Enhance your TypeRacer experience with custom images that stay exactly how you want them!

Features:
✨ Easy image selection and editing
🔄 Persistent across sessions
🎨 Built-in image dimensions editor
🚀 Simple, clean interface
💪 Zero performance impact

How to use:
1. Click the extension icon
2. Upload your image or paste an image URL
3. Adjust as needed
4. Done! Your custom image will persist exactly as you wanted 🥳

All changes are client-side only and won't affect other users.
